entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016
